zing.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the quality of being full of energy or taste
zing.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Lemon juice adds zing to drinks.
zing.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to move quickly, making a whistling noise
zing.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: He could hear the bullets zinging past his head.
